summary.span: Contains a collection of objects.

span.span: Contains a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此集合中的索引標籤頁的順序會反映在相關的索引標籤的順序控制項。The order of tab pages in this collection reflects the order of tabs in the related control. 若要變更控制項中的索引標籤的順序，您必須變更其在集合中的位置移除它們，並將它們插入新的索引。To change the order of tabs in the control, you must change their positions in the collection by removing them and inserting them at new indexes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會建立包含集合的快照集的列舉值。This method creates an enumerator that contains a snapshot of the collection. 您可以藉由變更列舉值，變更集合不過，多個列舉值可以同時存取相同的集合。You can change the collection by changing the enumerator; however, multiple enumerators can simultaneously access the same collection. （直接或透過另一個列舉值），變更集合可能因此導致或擲回例外狀況。Changing the collection (either directly or through another enumerator) can thus cause or to throw an exception. 從相同的集合，在同一時間建立的兩個列舉值可以包含不同的快照集。Two enumerators created from the same collection at the same time can contain different snapshots. 移除列舉值的物件也會移除這些集合。Removing objects from the enumerator also removes them from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果呼叫，最後傳回會檢查索引鍵相符的項目第一次，而且如果沒有相符項目，搜尋會從集合的開頭。If is called successively, the last returned index will be checked for a key match first, and if there is no match, the search starts at the beginning of the collection. 屬性會對應到索引鍵在。The property corresponds to the key for a in the . 索引鍵的比較不區分大小寫。The key comparison is not case-sensitive. 如果`key`參數是`null`或空字串，會傳回-1。If the `key` parameter is `null` or an empty string, returns -1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會對應到索引鍵在。The property corresponds to the key for a in the . 方法可讓您建立並插入指定位置的索引標籤頁。The method allows you to create and insert a tab page at a specified location. 若要新增的索引標籤頁但不指定集合中的特定位置，請使用方法。To add a tab page without specifying a particular position in the collection, use the method. 如果您想要加入至集合的項目陣列，使用方法。If you want to add an array of items to the collection, use the method. `imageKey`參數會參考中的映像屬性。The `imageKey` parameter refers to an image in the property of the .
